encyclopedia.content: 游戏简介 Pitfall_ The Mayan Adventure（玛雅人的冒险） 这是一套专为 WINDOWS 95 所开发的动作游戏，游戏本身的音效及画面的动作效果非常的顺畅，足以媲美任何一套TV GAME，实在是个不玩不可、不可不玩的超级动作游戏。游戏操作 方向键：键盘 ←左 →右 ↑上 ↓下S : 跳跃D : 发射A : 鞭 SPACE : 选择武器 ESC : 离开 游戏秘籍： EATMOREBRAN : 九次接关 FIVEEASYPIECES : 通过1-5关 HATMAN : 在手杖中旋转 IDBUYTHATFORADOLLAR

entry.def: The pitfalls involved in a particular activity or situation are the things that may go wrong or may cause problems.

example.ex: The pitfalls of working abroad are numerous...
example.tran: 到国外工作存在许多陷阱。

example.ex: He also points out that forward planning can help avoid stressful pitfalls.
example.tran: 他也指出，预先计划可有助于消除令人不安的隐患。

means.word_mean: 1. an unforeseen or unexpected or surprising difficulty
2. a trap in the form of a concealed hole

Sentence.sentence: Just when you had figured out how to manage fat in your diet, researchers are now warning against another common mealtime pitfall (陷阱) — salt.
